title: The Architecture of AI Transformation: Four Strategic Patterns and an Emerging Frontier
summary: Despite extensive investment in artificial intelligence, 95% of enterprises report no measurable profit impact from AI deployments (MIT, 2025). In this theoretical paper, we argue that this gap reflects paradigmatic lock-in that channels AI into incremental optimization rather than structural transformation.
